name: VR Spiderman Web Swinging Simulator
description:
This is a massive web-swinging simulator set in New York City. You can swing through the city on webs with better physics than any other VR webswinging game as of yet! Defeat enemies, stop bank robberies, stop muggings, it's all here!

This game is a work in progress, so please be kind if you find any bugs. Any feedback at all is greatly appreciated!

This is the test build, and still has many bugs and issue, but is very much playable! I wanted to let as many people play this as possible!
